item.title: pyenv, virtualenv, freeze
packages
item.description: 1. What are R packages and why would you use them? R packaging is a convenient way to store and share your R code. It lets you incorporate testing with testthat specially prepared tools (you can use testthat without creating a package, but it’s slightly more complicated). It lets you easily list dependencies with packrat. You can also achieve this without using a package. You can easily version your code.
